section.title:
shipping forms
printing of Print Shipping Forms
section.para: To print multiple Shipping Forms, select the "Shipping Forms" option. The following screen will appear:
When printing multiple Shipping Forms, you are presented with the following options:

varlistentry.term: Print Shipping Forms for new Shipments

listitem.para: : Select to print Shipping Forms for new Shipments.

varlistentry.term: Print Shipping Forms for Changed Shipments

listitem.para: Select to print Shipping Forms for changed Shipments.
Specify details for the Shipping Form copies you want to print.
# of Copies: Indicate the number of copies you want to print using the arrow buttons. Information about the specified copies will display below. To add a Watermark, double-click on a copy line.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without printing Shipping Forms, returning you to the application desktop.
Prints specified number of copies of the Shipping Forms.

section.para: To add a Watermark to Shipping Forms, double-click on a copy line. The following screen will appear:
When adding a Watermark to Shipping Form copies, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the name of the Watermark to be used for the selected copy.
Select to show Prices in the selected copy.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without adding a Watermark, returning you to the previous screen.
Saves the Watermark definition to the selected copy.
